title: 12/24: Waiver Wire and GB-MIN Reaction (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Mike Boone was a dud, but Aaron Jones was a nice holiday present for Fantasy managers. We reflect on Week 16 to start the show before giving you the news and notes (7:05) and top overall Waiver Wire priorities for Week 17 (9:30). Which SEA RB do we want to add? Check for DeAndre Washington, Justin Watson, Daniel Jones, Greg Ward and others. Also we tell you which teams could be sitting their starters (12:40) ... Top priorities at QB (14:30) including Jones and Andy Dalton, RB (18:00) including Gus Edwards and Alexander Mattison, WR (24:55) including Steven Sims and Anthony Miller, TE (29:30) including Jacob Hollister and Kaden Smith plus DST and K ... Fantasy Regulators (34:35), KC-CHI recap (39:30) and a longer look at the Waiver Wire at each position (41:00) ... Your emails at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: Reacting to GB-MIN and looking ahead to the Week 17 Waiver Wire! Who can you add if you're looking for a championship?
